text: We took Mom today on #ValentinesDay 💘 for her scheduled appt. for her #COVID19 #vaccine 💉So far so good feels. Her next appt. they gave her is on #StPatricksDay 🍀I said, Mom you should play the lottery 😄 Anyone else think  it's funny the dates they gave her 🤭 .What luck https://t.co/7anoZS4yV4
